mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, name, log_date, status, score, type) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{logDate}, #{status}, #{score}, #{type})
mapper.update: update user set id=#{id}, username=#{username}, password=#{password}, name=#{name}, log_date=#{logDate}, status=#{status}, score=#{score}, type=#{type} where id = #{id}
